Master of Science in Cybersecurity (MSC-CS)

The Master of Science in Cybersecurity program is designed to train the next generation of security experts. The curriculum covers a wide range of topics, including network security, digital forensics, ethical hacking, and risk management. We provide students with the theoretical knowledge and practical skills needed to protect digital assets from ever-evolving threats.

Our program emphasizes a hands-on approach, using a dedicated cyber lab for real-world simulations and threat analysis. Graduates are prepared for careers as security analysts, penetration testers, and security architects in both the private and public sectors.
